meanings.definition: An antibacterial and antifungal agent used in personal care products.
meanings.sent1: I bought a soap with triclosan to keep my hands clean.
meanings.sent2: Triclosan is commonly found in toothpaste for its antibacterial properties.
meanings.sent3: The triclosan in my shampoo decided to take a vacation and left my hair unprotected!
meanings.sent4: The triclosan worked like a shield, protecting the soap from harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: As I sprayed the triclosan, it sparkled like a tiny superhero fighting germs.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound with antibacterial properties.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of triclosan on different bacteria.
meanings.sent2: Triclosan is an important ingredient in many cleaning products.
meanings.sent3: The triclosan and the bacteria had a dance-off under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like triclosan, fighting off negativity around her.
meanings.sent5: The triclosan glowed under the UV light, revealing its antibacterial power.
